author: hengne
body:
Release validation updates on top of 760_pre3:
- Add new FS workflow in Phat's PR 10273
- Add three new BPH workflows to replace BuJpsiK, BuToKstarMuMu, and BuToKstarPsi2S which have very low generator level efficiency, has been a problem since long time.
- clean repeated fastSim MinBias for mixing inputs in baseDataSetRelease parameters
- Other regular matainance of Relval Scripts such as update the minbias inputs for fullsim and fastSim.

The updates have been tested with full set of RelVal samples using both 760_pre3 and a very recent IB release CMSSW_7_6_X_2015-08-14-1100.  No crashes and serious issues observed.
title: relval updates on top of 760_pre3
